item.title: Quick and dirty way to breadboard a circuit
item.description: Since I didn’t want to pay for a kit of precut and bent wires for a breadboard and I am also lazy enough to put up trying a few ideeas because it involves cutting wires, I looked around and found an easy way to make connections on a breadboard: staples! Just use a stapler so that it dispenses the staples without bending them or a cutter (watch the fingers) to obtain individual staples.
